title: How to unsubscribe from Instacart+
description: You can cancel your Instacart+ membership at any time. Generally, there are no refunds for the current billing period. It's critical to cancel at least 24-48 hours before your renewal date to avoid surprise renewals.

web.title: Cancel Instacart+ Membership via Website
web.description:
To cancel your Instacart+ membership through the website:

*   Go to the Instacart website and log in to your account.
*   Make sure you're on the correct profile if you share a family plan.
*   Click the three horizontal lines in the top left corner or your profile icon in the top right.
*   Select "Your Instacart+ Membership" (formerly Express) from the dropdown menu.
*   Scroll down to the bottom of the page and click "Cancel Membership".
*   Click "Continue to Cancel". You might have to click multiple times.
*   Use any pickup credits or promotional balances tied specifically to your Instacart+ membership before canceling.

phone.title: Cancel Instacart+ Membership via Phone
phone.description:
To cancel your Instacart+ membership via phone:

*   Call their customer support line at (888) 246-7822 for assistance.

app.title: Cancel Instacart+ Membership via Google Play Store
app.description:
To cancel your Instacart+ membership through the Google Play Store:

*   If you pay through Google, open the Google Play Store app.
*   Tap your profile picture.
*   Go to "Payments & subscriptions," then "Subscriptions."
*   Cancel Instacart+.

seo_text: Learn how to easily cancel your Instacart+ subscription. Follow our step-by-step guide to end your Instacart+ membership and avoid unwanted charges. We provide clear instructions for online cancellation and alternative methods, including contacting customer support. Ensure you cancel before your renewal date to prevent being charged for the next billing cycle.
